name: Get to the choppa! (Cvetk0)
description:
Something has gone terribly wrong in the settlement of uplings. The power is dwindling and you are the settlement's only hope. Descent into the depths of the planet using alien flying machine and be the hero!

 Controls
- WASD / Arrow keys - fly/walk
- E - interact
- Q - embark/disembark

Note on web sound: I’ve experienced serious sound issues when playing in browser. If you hear scratching music, please use executable downloads. Those should not have sound issues.
